name: KOLOBOK
description: Go through the epic path of Kolobok, prove to yourself and everyone that he is alive and can think.
minimum_requirements: OS: xp, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel atom 1.2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 8 8.1 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Better then Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
